seo.title: MapleGrowth Digital — Digital Marketing Agency in Canada | Growth & Small Business Marketing
seo.description: Canadian digital marketing agency delivering SEO, PPC, content, and web design. Internet marketing services built for growth-focused small businesses and scale-ups.

hero.title: Smart Marketing. Measurable Growth.
hero.subhead: A Canadian digital marketing agency for small businesses and growth-focused brands.
hero.body: MapleGrowth Digital is a growth marketing agency that blends creativity, data, and strategy. We deliver internet marketing services you can see, measure, and trust — from SEO and PPC to conversion-focused web design.

cta.label: Book a strategy call
cta.ariaLabel: Book a strategy call with MapleGrowth Digital

services.title: Digital Marketing Services That Drive Growth
services.subtitle: As a Canadian online marketing company, we help small businesses and scale-ups win with strategy, creativity, and technology.
services.note: Every project — big or small — gets the same focus: fast performance, strong security, and mobile-ready experiences.

items.title: SEO & Analytics
items.description: Technical SEO, on-page optimization, content strategy, and analytics that compound results.

items.title: PPC & Paid Media
items.description: ROI-first campaigns across Google, YouTube, and social. Built for fast, measurable growth.

items.title: Web Design & Development
items.description: Conversion-focused, accessible websites engineered for speed, security, and scalability.

items.title: Content & Email
items.description: Editorial calendars, sales enablement content, and lifecycle email that nurtures demand.

items.title: Brand & Creative
items.description: Brand systems, ad creative, and motion assets that boost recognition and conversion.

items.title: Growth Strategy
items.description: Positioning, messaging, and go-to-market plans tailored to small business digital marketing.

process.title: How We Build Growth
process.intro: A repeatable framework that aligns strategy with execution — the backbone of our digital marketing services.

steps.title: 1. Discover
steps.description: Goals, audience, and market. We map opportunities and prioritize impact.

steps.title: 2. Design
steps.description: From wireframes to creative concepts — built for clarity and conversion.

steps.title: 3. Develop
steps.description: Fast, secure builds and campaign setups tracked end-to-end.

steps.title: 4. Deploy
steps.description: Launch, learn, and iterate with dashboards and growth sprints.

items.title: Our Core Belief
items.quote: Clicks don’t equal growth. We focus on results that move your business forward.

items.title: The MapleGrowth Mindset
items.quote: Marketing isn’t about shouting louder — it’s about connecting smarter.

work.title: Selected Work
work.subtitle: A snapshot of recent e-commerce and B2B growth engagements.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.intro: How our internet marketing services turn strategy into measurable growth.

items.title: Nundle (Inland NSW Tourism)
items.summary: We built a clear value proposition, improved search visibility, and ran targeted campaigns to grow regional visits and revenue.

items.title: Dummy Case Study
items.summary: From positioning to performance media — a full-funnel approach that scaled qualified demand.

about.title: About MapleGrowth Digital
about.body: We’re a Canadian growth marketing agency dedicated to small business digital marketing. Our cross-disciplinary team ships strategy, creative, and engineering under one roof.
highlights: Direct collaboration with designers, developers, and strategists
Remote-first, with support available across Canada
about.ceoNote: Growth comes from pairing creativity with accountability — ideas translated into measurable outcomes.

book.title: Book a Strategy Call
paragraphs: If you’re looking for a partner who cares about outcomes, let’s talk. We’ll review goals, channels, and quick wins for your next growth sprint.
